# Heal Mount (Spell)
## Overview
[[Conjuration Spells|Conjuration]] ([[Healing Spells|healing]])

**Level:** [[3rd Level Paladin Spells|Paladin 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Your mount touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 294

This spell functions like *[[Heal (Spell)|heal]]**,* but it affects only the paladinâ€™s special mount (typically a horse).
